text: Athaba tara ki bale -- ''se allah samparke eka mithya udbhabana kareche?â€™â€™ Kinta allah yadi ca'itena tahale tomara hrdaye tini mohara mere ditena. Bastuta allah mithyake muche phelena ebam satyake satya pratipanna karabena tamra banira dbara. Nihsandeha tadera antare ya rayeche se-sanbandhe tini samyaka jnata.
